Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ فِي الْأَمْرِ قَبْلَ مُلَابَسَتِهِ يُؤْمِنُ الزَّلَلَ
enWisdom: Thinking about a matter before undertaking it saves one from error

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ يُوجِبُ الِاعْتِبَارَ وَيُؤْمِنُ الْعِثَارَ وَيُثْمِرُ الِاسْتِظْهَارَ
enWisdom: Thinking leads to taking lesson, saves one from missteps and bears the fruit of precaution

Wisdom: أَصْلُ السَّلَامَةِ مِنَ الزَّلَلِ الْفِكْرُ قَبْلَ الْفِعْلِ وَالرَّوِيَّةُ قَبْلَ الْكَلَامِ
enWisdom: The root of safety from error is thinking before acting, and reflecting before speaking

Wisdom: دَعِ الْحِدَّةَ وَتَفَكَّرْ فِي الْحُجَّةِ وَتَحَفَّظْ مِنَ الْخَطَلِ تَأْمَنِ الزَّلَلَ
enWisdom: Repel [your] rage, think about the proof and protect yourself from nonsense you will be safe from slip-ups

Wisdom: دَوَامُ الْفِكْرِ وَالْحَذَرِ يُؤْمِنُ الزَّلَلَ وَيُنْجِي مِنَ الْغِيَرِ
enWisdom: Continuous reflection and caution protects from error and saves from the vicissitudes of time

Wisdom: فَكِّرْ ثُمَّ تَكَلَّمْ تَسْلَمْ مِنَ الزَّلَلِ
enWisdom: Think and then speak, [for by this] you will remain safe from error
